description: Builds release history notes from unreleased pull requests on GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps Services / Server, BitBucket Cloud and Bitbucket Server and optionally posts them to a markdown file, Atlassian Confluence and Slack.
summary: Builds release history notes from unreleased pull requests on GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps Services / Server, BitBucket Cloud and Bitbucket Server and optionally posts them to a markdown file, Atlassian Confluence and Slack.
author: Jasmin Sehic
